name: Spiroid
description:
You and your crew are travelling through space in a Class A Dreadnaught Spaceship but you got trapped in a gravitational mechanism , if you don't deactivate its barrier and destroy it... you won't survive! Aim and shoot while you are trapped in the spiral!

PS: Don't forget to dodge or destroy the asteroids!!

PS2: If the game doesn't load, just refresh the page D: 

Controls:

Use ←/→ arrows to move and Space to shoot!
